casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Timothy RICHARDSON. No. 232A95-5. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 7, 2015. Howard A. Kurtz, Raleigh. Jonathan P. Babb, Special Counsel to Attorney General, for State of NC. Kenneth J. Rose, Durham, Thomas J. Moore, II, Rocky Mount, for Richardson, Timothy. Robert A. Evans, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th of August 2015 by Defendant for Enlargement of Time to File Petition for Writ of Certiorari:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of August 2015."
